name: Revenue Xpress
overview:
We are a medical billing company, providing multiple services to optimize the entire revenue cycle for healthcare providers.

Our web-based billing and reimbursement management system provides 24 hour access and complete transparency to our clients. We guarantee increased reimbursements and lower operating costs from traditional in-house billing departments. Our XpressBill insurance reimbursement system provides a first-pass acceptance rate greater than 95%, 24-hour coding and processing of every patient encounter and guaranteed satisfaction.

Our portfolio of services includes:

XpressBill, Medical Billing Services | XpressCode, Procedural Coding | XpressRAC, Post Billing Audit | XpressEMR, Electronic Medical Records Technology | XpressPay, Electronic Patient Payment Plan | XpressCollect, Delinquent Patient Collections | XpressDocuStore, Electronic Web-based Document Imaging and Storage | The Option to Receive AdvancedMD Practice Management Software at No Additional Cost to All Medical Billing Clients
